title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.8 - Government connection, approval or endorsement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.8 - Government connection, approval or endorsement

State Regulations

If a fallout shelter design meets the minimum
requirements of the New York State Civil Defense Commission, the advertiser may
disclose the fact in advertising. Even though the shelter design meets the
aforementioned requirements, however, an advertiser shall not represent that
the shelter has been approved or endorsed by the State or by an agency of the

State. Thus, the use of seals, insignia, trade or brand names, or any other
term or symbol implying State government connection, approval or endorsement
shall not be used in advertising. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
500.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
